name: Fish Out of Water (Jakerbaker)
description:
Fish out of Water is a short, hard platformer where you try to beat the levels while also running out of air. Flop, dive, and swim to try and beat the rage game! 

Controls

A or Left key = lean left

D or Right key = lean right

Space or jump key = jump

The game will be continually updated across the next month or so

I made this game for the 2022 game-off game jam I made it in just 2 weeks so there will be bugs! I had a blast making it, so I hope you enjoy it! 

keep on swimming -Jakerbaker
